Template Function polyval6¶

  • Defined in File physical_parameterizations.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
float_t polyval6(const double a0, const double a1, const double a2, const double a3, const double a4, const double a5, const double a6, float_t x)¶

Evaluate a polynomial

of order 6 using Horner’s method.

Return

Value at x

Parameters

  • a0: Coefficient of the polynomial.

  • a1: Coefficient of the polynomial.

  • a2: Coefficient of the polynomial.

  • a3: Coefficient of the polynomial.

  • a4: Coefficient of the polynomial.

  • a5: Coefficient of the polynomial.

  • a6: Coefficient of the polynomial.

  • x: Value at which to evaluate the polynomial.
